description: A 49-year-old man arrested on suspicion of murder following a woman's death is released on bail.
title: Lowestoft death: Man bailed after arrest over woman's murder
title_page: Lowestoft death: Man bailed after arrest over woman's murder - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been bailed after he was arrested on suspicion of murdering a woman at a flat.
Suffolk Police said officers were called to London Road South, Lowestoft, at 07:10 GMT on Saturday, after the East of England Ambulance Service reported the "sudden death" of a woman in her 40s.
A 49-year-old man from Lowestoft was arrested on suspicion of murder and has been bailed until the end of May.
Detectives said they were treating the woman's death as an "isolated incident" and the man and woman were known to each other.
